DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter study design investigate clinical utility safety pramlintide treatment subject type 1 type 2 diabetes fail achieve desire level glycemic control use insulin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Utility Safety Pramlintide Subjects With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: The subject clinical diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus require treatment insulin minimum 6 month Screening ; OR The subject clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes require treatment insulin without oral antidiabetic agent minimum 6 month Screening . The subject HbA1c 7.0 % 11.0 % Screening .
